codes:
import sys

n = int(sys.stdin.readline().strip())
a = [int(x) for x in sys.stdin.readline().strip().split()]

t = 0
cost = 0
for i in range(n):
    if abs(a[i] - t) > 1:
        t = (a[i] + 1) // 2
    cost += abs(a[i] - t)

print(t, cost)
































































































































































































































































































































































































import sys

n = int(sys.stdin.readline().strip())
a = [int(x) for x in sys.stdin.readline().strip().split()]

t = 1
cost = 0
for i in range(n):
    if abs(a[i] - t) > 1:
        t += 1
        cost += abs(a[i] - t)

print(t, cost)























































































































































































































































































































































































































































n=int(input())
a=list(map(int,input().split()))
t=1
cost=0
for i in range(n):
    if abs(a[i]-t)>1:
        t+=1
        cost+=abs(a[i]-t)
    else:
        cost+=abs(a[i]-t)
print(t,cost)

n = int(input())
a = list(map(int, input().split()))
t = 0
cost = 0
for i in range(n):
    if abs(a[i] - t) > 1:
        t = (a[i] + 1) // 2
        cost += abs(a[i] - t) + abs(a[i] - 2 * t)
    else:
        cost += abs(a[i] - t)
print(t, cost)




























































































































































































































































































































































































import math

n = int(input())
a = list(map(int, input().split()))

t = 0
cost = 0
for i in range(n):
    if abs(a[i] - t) > 1:
        t = math.ceil((a[i] + 1) / 2)
        cost += t - a[i]
print(t, cost)
